00021 VNT::VNT(const VNT& other)
00022 {

00024         m_n = 0;
00025         m_t = 0;

00055 void VNT::setN(Vertex* n)
00056 {

00058         {
00059                 delete m_n;
00060         }
00061

00081 void VNT::draw() const
00082 {
00083         if (m_t)
00084         {
00085                 glTexCoord2f(m_t->getX(), m_t->getY());
00086         }
00087 
00088         if (m_n)
00089         {
00090                 glNormal3f(m_n->getX(), m_n->getY(), m_n->getZ());
00091         }
00092 
00093         glVertex3f(m_v->getX(), m_v->getY(), m_v->getZ());
00094 }
